title: Theft at Osman Hadi’s Jhalakathi home
body: A theft occurred at the village home of Sharif Osman Hadi, convener of Inquilab Mancha, who is in a critical condition and undergoing treatment after being shot in the head in the capital on Friday. The theft took place on Saturday at the Khasmahal area of Nalchity in Jhalakathi, when no family members were home as the family was away in Dhaka. Osman Hadi’s cousin Sirajul Islam confirmed the matter. He said that the thief broke the window and entered the house. ‘We are yet to confirm the amount of goods the thief took away,’ he added. Nalchiti police station officer-in-charge Ariful Alam said, ‘We have visited the scene, those involved will be brought to justice soon.’
